title: vAzhvinil tunbam
sahitya:
vAzhvinil tunbam varuvadum AshaiyAl manamE idi nI ariyAyO


anupallavi

  shUzh kaDalulagil shuzhanruzhalAdE Uzhvinai ozhiyavE oru tani vazhi kAN


caraNam    tIyavai tavirttu shIriya purindu kAyudal kaDindu karuNaiyE ninaindu 
shenneri ninriDal shIlamE yAgum en ayyan magizhvAn inbamum kUDum
